member.summary: Creates a file mapping

member.name: M:CrudApi.Controllers.NodeController.CreateDDBDataflow(API.DTO.DFParam)
member.summary: Creates a DDBDataflow: it controls DDBDataflow and SDMX dataflow are not inconsistent and then creates corrispondent artefact in MSDB e DDB. Optionally creates dataflow's categorisations and header. If the dataflow has fewer columns than the original cube a new DSD is also created.
member.param: Object with: ddbDF: Dataflow to be created in DDB. msdbDF: SDMX-JSON containing dataflow to be created in MSDB. msdbCat: SDMX-JSON containing categorisations to be created in MSDB. msdbDF: HeaderTemplate to be created in MSDB.

Path of the file from whom the temp table has been generated.

Whether the data have to be embargoed or not.
